successes.title: The Flame in the Flood
successes.description: A rogue-lite river journey through the backwaters of a forgotten post-societal America. Forage, craft, evade predators. For PC & Mac.

Pledges.description: Our gratitude for helping us make this game a reality.
Early bird digital copy: Digital copy of the game for PC/Mac + Exclusive backer digital wallpapers
Digital copy of the game for PC/Mac + Exclusive backer digital wallpapers
Digital copy of the game for PC/Mac + Exclusive backer digital wallpapers + An exclusive Hat & Staff for Scout in game.

All of the above, PLUS a digital art book and a digital copy of the soundtrack by Chuck Ragan. Making a high production value original album isn't cheap, and this tier will help us make the best soundtrack possible.
All of the above, PLUS an exclusive in-game Raft, Hound, and backpack only available for Kickstarter backers, and a signed postcard from the team.
All of the above, PLUS your name in the credits as a BACKER, and a handsome embroidered patch that demonstrates your status as a survivor in a harsh world. International shipping rates will apply.

All of the above, PLUS a sweet poster featuring the art of Scott Sinclair, AND you get your name in the game. You can stumble across your island or old camp as you play the game, as will every other player. (subject to creative review)
All of the above, PLUS a swanky t-shirt only available ever to Kickstarter backers, and your name in a special PATRON section of the credits.
All of the above, PLUS a signed fine art print featuring the work of Scott Sinclair, AND a physical art book.

All of the above, PLUS take part in a development play & feedback session with the lead designer on the project, either in the office or via skype (or hangouts or whatever). Play an in development version of the game, share your feedback, contribute your thoughts, and get credited as PATRON CONSULTANT in the credits.

All of the above, PLUS you help design a character that is added to the roster of NPCs to encounter. Who are they? What do they want? What quirks make them a unique memorable addition to the world? Help us fill the world with interesting personalities. You will be credited as PATRON DESIGNER.
Everything above (except design a character) PLUS An original 12x12 acrylic on board painting by Scott Sinclair.
Most of the above (not including 'design a character'), PLUS Your dog will be made into a selectable companion in game. You will be credited as DOG LOVER (or whatever.. you can decide).
